Information Technology Outsourcing

Yempo provides IT staff including infrastructure engineers, software developers and testers, solutions architects and technical support analysts.
+

Financial Management Outsourcing

Accountants, CPAs, bookkeepers and financial accountants are readily available in the Philippines at a fraction of the cost in western locations.
+

Sales and Marketing Outsourcing

Grow your business by using Yempo to host your outbound sales calls, manage your social media accounts, create strategic marketing campaigns, and maintaining your website.
+

Business Administration Outsourcing

Highly-trained administrative staff can perform data entry, transcribing, research, and a wide range of other tasks, in your time zone and at your convenience.
+

Flexible Offshore Solutions

Michelle Fiegehen, CEO

At Yempo, we are proud to provide flexible offshoring solutions tailored to your needs. We cater for companies of all sizes and specialise in assisting clients who are new to offshoring. Whether your business needs to grow rapidly, reduce costs or you just can't find the particular skill you need, we can help. Our exceptional staff benefits and professional offices ensure your employees offshore are productive and happy.

Contact us today for a free assessment, and see the Yempo difference.

 

Free Assessment

 

What we offer

Yempo offers low cost, high calibre staffing solutions to organisations wanting to extend their services, reduce costs or grow their business.

We work closely with you to understand your goals and objectives and enable access to the benefits of offshoring previously only available to large organisations. Your employees offshore work 100% on your business, in our professional offices with new infrastructure and Western on-site management.
